import React, { Component } from "react"; class Cart extends Component { state = { arr: [], total: 0 }; deleteFromCart = id => { fetch(`http://localhost:5000/shopping-cart/${id}`, { method: "DELETE" }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(() => this.componentDidMount()); }; updateQuantity =(value, id) => { fetch(`http://localhost:5000/shopping-cart/${id}`, { method: "PATCH", body: JSON.stringify({ quantity: value }), headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" } }).then(response => response.json()) .then(() => this.componentDidMount()); }; componentDidMount() { fetch("http://localhost:5000/shopping-cart") .then(res => res.json()) .then(arr => this.setState({ arr: arr, total: arr.reduce((total, x) => (total += x.quantity * x.price), 0) }) ); } render() { return (
{this.state.arr.map(x => ( ))}

PRICE
QUANTITY
REMOVE

{" "} {x.price} $ this.updateQuantity(e.target.value, x._id)} type="number" min="1" value={x.quantity} />
total
$
); } } export default Cart;
